description: About SANOXYSANOXY offers variety of home and business computer networking products and accessories. We focus to provide reliable performance at affordable price with customer support for each SANOXY brand purchase SANOXY Bluetooth Adapteris a fingernail-sized unit that can plug into laptop or tablet's USB port for instant functionality.SANOXY Bluetooth Adapter uses standard V2.0 and USB 2.0 technology to deliver quick connection times and up to 3x faster data transfer speed than older v1.2 adapters.Get your laptop sharing data with your Bluetooth-enabled PDA, headset, printer and other devices in no time. Its amazingly compact design makes it easy to fit into any travel bag or laptop case. Features:Plug and play.Convert non-Bluetooth PCs into Bluetooth-enabled machines.Wirelessly connect to Bluetooth devices such as mobile phones or PDAs for data transfer, networking, fax, and all sorts of other tasks.Enabled wireless connection to Bluetooth headset.Supports Bluetooth voice data. Supports multiple languages. SANOXY Bluetooth Adapter does not need any drivers for use on compatible operating systems (see below). Specifications:Bluetooth specification:V 2.0 & V 1.2 Compliant.I/O Interface:USB compliance.Supported profiles:networking, Dial-up, Fax, LAN access , and Headset.Operating systems:Windows 98, 98SE, ME, 2000, XP, VISTA and Windows 7.Receiving / Sending range:0-100m (realistically 10-20m in open space. Maximum operating range depends on environmental factors.)Data rate:up to 3Mbps. Input Power: DC 5V (USB Power).
title: SANOXY® USB Bluetooth Wireless Adapter for HP, Gateway, eMachine, Dell or ANY Laptop/PC Running Windows 98, 98SE, ME, 200, XP, Vista & WINDOWS 7
